<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Radiant Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=780)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The enigmatic and strange radiant wardens were constructed thousands of years ago to protect observatories and scholars against the incursion of alien aggressors from the Dominion of the Black. Over time, their roles as guardians expanded to include watching over any region where the laws of time and space have worn thin, particularly near portals and permanent gates between planets, planes, or dimensions.

 Named for both the radial nature of the concentric rings that make up their bodies as well as the glowing radiance of their attacks, radiant wardens carry on their orders, defending sites from invasion with single-minded purpose.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/RadiantWarden.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Radiant Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=780)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 220 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
any one ancient language (such as [Jistkan](/Languages.aspx?ID=59))

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +32, [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +36, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +32

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +6

**Con** +5

**Int** +6

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 40 

**Fort** +32 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 300

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), nonlethal attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
mental 15, physical 15 (except adamantine)

**Gatekeeper Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) 60 feet. A creature that uses a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) ability within the aura's emanation or enters it via a teleportation ability must succeed a DC 38 Will save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and have its destination changed to a point of the radiant warden's choosing within the emanation. On a successful save, the creature arrives as intended but is still sickened 1.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hammer +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 3d12+15 bludgeoning plus radiant blow

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
radiant beam +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d10 force

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 38
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will)
- **7th**
[Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233)
- **8th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43) (×3), [Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267)
- **9th**
[Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)

**Orrery** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) Until it acts, the radiant warden appears to be an orrery (or similar large mechanical contraption, such as a telescope). It has an automatic result of 53 on [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks and DCs to convincingly pass as such a machine.

**Radiant Blast** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The radiant warden releases a 50-foot cone of bright energy that deals 10d12 force damage (DC 38 basic Reflex save). The radiant warden can't use Radiant Blast for 1d4 rounds.

**Radiant Blow**   When a creature is hit by the radiant warden's hammer Strike, a flash of radiant energy attempts to anchor the creature in place. The creature must attempt a DC 38 Will save; on a failure, the creature can't use any [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effects for 1 minute. On a critical failure, the creature is also permanently [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Ancient Intellects</title>

Each radiant warden's animating force consists of raw positive energy fused to the soul of a willing sacrifice—usually an astronomer or scholar near the end of their natural life. Focused now on protecting a site from any intrusion— including by curious archaeologists or adventurers—a radiant warden might pause before an attack if approached peacefully. Unfortunately, these constructs are prone to speaking in vague riddles or complex mathematical diatribes that can be as confusing as they are intriguing; often, discussions break down as frustration mounts on either side (or both).
</aside>
